description: Vegan meatballs are delicious with crisp veggies and sweet and sour sauce, much tastier than takeaway.
keywords: Meatballs,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Plant-based,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Sweet & Sour Vegan Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large capsicums, red and green, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the meatballs, stirring often, for 5 minutes until browned all over. Add the onions and capsicums and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Stir in the garlic and ginger paste and tomato sauce and cook for 1 minute. Add the chopped pineapple, juice, honey, white wine vinegar and soy sauce and a splash of water if necessary.
Reduce the heat and simmer for 10 minutes or until the sauce has thickened.
